entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
